Texts.Eng:
It's a bird! No, it's a space ship! No, it's a LITERAL FLYING HORSE!

Diet: ^green;Herbivore^reset;

^orange;Perks^reset;:
Enduring: +^green;25^reset;% Energy, +^green;40^reset;% Energy Regeneration
Agile: +^green;10^reset;% Speed, +^green;5^reset;% Jump, +^green;70^reset;% Fall Damage Resistance
 
^orange;Environment^reset;:

In Garden, Jungle, Primeval, Forest and Savannah biomes, +^green;10^reset;% Energy, +^green;7^reset;% Speed & Jump and +^green;10^reset;% Physical Resist.
In cold or hot biomes -^red;10^reset;% HP, -^red;10^reset;% speed & jump and -^red;30^reset;% Energy Regeneration.
Lose ^red;50^reset;% Energy and ^red;15^reset;% Speed in Alien or fleshy biomes.
^orange;Weapons^reset;:

Spears: +^green;9^reset;% Damage
Double Grenade Launchers: +^green;7.5^reset;% Speed, +^green;25^reset;% Crit Damage
Bows: +^green;4^reset;% Crit Chance, +^green;10^reset;% Energy Regen
Assault Rifles: +^green;7^reset;% Speed

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:

-^red;15^reset;% HP
+^red;20^reset;% Hunger Rate
Weak: ^red;10^reset;% Fire, Ice, Electric, ^red;33^reset;% Shadow
^yellow;-50^reset;% Knockback Resist. Useful if you don't want to be chained however.
